channel.title: I am having problems working with my client.java stuff im a newb need help
channel.description:
Hey im hoping i can find someone to help me. When im doing stuff in my client.java and save it compile my server when i check to see if it works nothing is changed. But when i do somthing to my items.conf it works fine and the things i put in work. Its really wierd i no my compiler works cause it works for my conf but i cant client.java thing to work i dono i need help
example- i change what a npc says save compile runserver nothing is changed.

item.title: I am having problems working with my client.java stuff im a newb need help

hey ty ill check rite now come on and check my server chaos-scape.no-ip.org ill give u mod or somthing[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2008, 07:09:52 AM[/size][hr]alright i tried i got somthing sayign i dont have java downloaded and then a press c and it says finish

item.source: I am having problems working with my client.java stuff im a newb need help

item.title: I am having problems working with my client.java stuff im a newb need help
item.dc:creator: @nklink nklink
item.description:
@nklink wrote:

I had that same problem, what I did was I changed my compiler… here i’ll give you mine…

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

That compiler is a basic one that works perfectly and does everything =]

I HOPE I HELPED YOU!

Read full topic
